item.title: Running LLAP on Compute Only Nodes
item.description: To run LLAP and/or Hive jobs on Compute Only Nodes you need to override a Hive Configuration default setting. Otherwise, queries will fail a majority of the time. The hive configuration value hive.merge.nway.joins is true by default. But in Ambari 2.7.3+ (HDP 3+), it overrides the default setting and configures this to false. When this is left at the default true, intermittent failures of queries will happen on compute only nodes.
